LSMLIB Namespace Reference


Classes

class  BoundaryConditionModule
 The BoundaryConditionModule provides support for several common boundary conditions for level set functions: homogeneous Neumann, extrapolation, and anti-periodic boundary conditions. See the NOTES section for how to set periodic boundary conditions. More...

class  FieldExtensionAlgorithm
 The FieldExtensionAlgorithm class is a utility class that provides support for extending field values off of the interface defined by the zero level set. More...

class  LevelSetFunctionIntegrator
 The LevelSetFunctionIntegrator class provides the core functionality required to integrate level set equation for evolving the level set function that capture the dynamics of implicit surfaces and curves. Support is provided for level set method calculations in one-, two- and three-dimensions. More...

class  LevelSetFunctionIntegratorStrategy
 The LevelSetFunctionIntegratorStrategy class defines the interface for the time integration of the level set functions in the level set method. More...

class  LevelSetMethodAlgorithm
 The LevelSetMethodAlgorithm class provides a simple interface for using the LevelSetMethod classes to capture the dynamics of implicit surfaces and curves in one-, two- and three-dimensions. It also provides support for vector level set method calculations. More...

class  LevelSetMethodGriddingAlgorithm
 The LevelSetMethodGriddingAlgorithm class provides basic functionality for managing grid refinement and data initialization for the the level set functions and variables involved in the computation of the velocity field. More...

class  LevelSetMethodGriddingStrategy
 The LevelSetMethodGriddingStrategy class defines the interface for data initialization and management of grid refinement for the level set method computation. More...

class  LevelSetMethodPatchStrategy
 The LevelSetMethodPatchStrategy class defines the interface for single patch, problem specific numerical routines. More...

class  LevelSetMethodToolbox
 LevelSetMethodToolbox is a utility class that provides support for several basic level set method algorithms and computations. More...

class  LevelSetMethodVelocityFieldStrategy
 The LevelSetMethodVelocityFieldStrategy class defines the interface for supplying the external velocity field and/or normal velocity field for a level set method calculation. More...

class  OrthogonalizationAlgorithm
 OrthogonalizationAlgorithm is a utility class that provides support for orthogonalizing two level set functions, phi and psi. More...

class  ReinitializationAlgorithm
 ReinitializationAlgorithm is a utility class that provides support for reinitializing the a level set function to be a distance function. More...


Enumerations

enum  LEVEL_SET_FCN_TYPE { PHI = 0, PSI = 1 }
enum  SPATIAL_DERIVATIVE_TYPE { ENO = 0, WENO = 1, UNKNOWN = 2 }

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum LSMLIB::LEVEL_SET_FCN_TYPE
 

Enumerated type for the two level set functions. Used to specify which level set function to use when computing extension fields.

Enumeration values:
PHI 
PSI 

enum LSMLIB::SPATIAL_DERIVATIVE_TYPE
 

Enumerated type for the different methods of computing spatial derivatives.

Enumeration values:
ENO 
WENO 
UNKNOWN
